DOC.brief_summary: To investigate changes in HRV during the time before a spontaneous episode of ventricular tachyarrhythmia.
DOC.brief_title: Change in Heart Rate Variability Prior to Tachyarrhythmia in ICD Implanted Patients
DOC.criteria: S/P lexos VR/T,DR/T implantation Signed patient informed consent CAF Life expectancy<6 months Impending heart transplant Persistent recurring tachycardia Rhythm disturbances that preclude a meaningful HRV analysis Participation in another study.
